name: Mad Maddy, The razor of Arcane
author: Draconis

posts.author: Pan Draconis
posts.content:
I was looking for a spellbade which was very balanced and versatile, with many ways to kill. I think this one worth it.

The build has been constructed with the help and with the inspiration of Grimnir, theSquid and Stagmeister.

Story :

The razor of Arcane is a confrérie of strong witches dedicated to fight the devil and the male domination of the Red Wizards of Thay.
Maddy has been enslaved by the red wizards when she was a child. She has been released by the razor of Arcane sisters but the enslavement made her really mad. Her madness is also a source of power, strenght and intelligence. She is able to unleash gusts of spells and blade ver fast. She uses two deadly inflamed razors to punish the red wizards devils. She hears voices. The voices are roguish and benevolent, and they tell her to do the right things (help other women) with the wrong means (sharpened razors).
